monster.name: Giant Badger

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 323, Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
